sentences.sContent: The Habsburg dynasty ruled in Austria from 1278 to 1918.
sentences.sCn: 哈布斯堡王朝在1278至1918年间统治奥地利。

sentences.sContent: One was Tang dynasty China, an empire stretching from the South China Sea to the borders of Persia, with ports open to foreign traders from far and wide.
sentences.sCn: 一个是中国的唐王朝，这个帝国的疆域辽阔，最南到南海，最西到波斯边境，而且所有的港口均向来自世界各地的商人开放。

words.tran: 元首；统治者；王朝的君主

trans.tranOther: a family of kings or other rulers whose parents, grandparents etc have ruled the country for many years
